attributes.action: pressure ITV to remove Clive Tyldesley as head commentator for live football matches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From screaming players names (GEERRRARRD, ROOOONEYYY etc) to inanely babbling on about 'that great night in Barca', constant referrals to Manchester United (even when not playing) and knowing far too much about players personal lives or pointless trivia Clive must be stopped from commentating on any future International Football games, especially the 2010 World Cup Finals in South Africa.  

This is not a personal issue, we're sure Clive is a nice man, he's just not very good at his job.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
